articles.title: Europe's Euclid space telescope to launch on July 1 - Hurriyet Daily News
articles.description: The European Space Agency said on June 21 its space telescope Euclid is scheduled to launch on July 1, blasting off on a mission to shed light on the mysteries of dark matter and dark energy.
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla.
